valueContactDetail.name: American Society of Clinical Oncology Author

name: StandardizedAssessmentToolsForDyspnea
title: Standardized Assessment Tools for Dyspnea
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent dyspnea assessment tools or instruments.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with dyspnea assessment scales such as Rose Dyspnea Tool; PROMIS dyspnea severity; PROMIS dyspnea functional limitations; Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy (FACIT-Dyspnea).),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
